title: The Circle's Beth Dunlavey gives coy update on Jack Quirk relationship
text:
Beth and Jack kissed on The Circle (Picture: Channel 4)

The Circle viewers went into meltdown as Jack Quirk and Beth Dunlavey kissed in their flat earlier this month, becoming the first official romance from the show.

The less said about Richard Madeley and Woody Cook, the better.

And Beth, 29, gave a coy update on how her relationship with the children’s event organiser is going, after leaving the show.

‘We’re just getting to know each other a bit more,’ she told Metro.co.uk exclusively on the red carpet at Kiss Haunted House Party.

‘It’s an intense environment in there and obviously I’ve got a lot of love for Jack…

‘But we’ll just see how it goes.’

Beth remained coy on her relationship status with Jack (Picture: PA)

The Circle ended on 18 October, with Paddy Smyth taking the crown in a shock result, beating Tim, Woody, Georgina and ‘Sammie’ – aka James – to the prize money.

Advertisement

Advertisement

James came under fire for his catfishing ways, after he played the game by pretending to be a single mum, and eventually managing to oust Ella from the show.

But the Circlers insisted there were no bad feelings between them all.

Georgina insisted: ‘No we love James! He’s a game player in a gameshow, let’s get that straight. He’s a lovely bloke.

The Circle stars have become closer than ever after the show ended (Picture: PA)

‘He stepped up for £100,000. So what?’

And Ella admitted they’re all just trying to ‘make up for lost time’ after being forced to communicate solely through a computer screen.

Speaking about how they have bonded following the series, she said: ‘It’s the only reality TV show where you don’t meet the players until afterwards, we’ve only been chatting to people via The Circle.

‘So afterwards we’re making up for lost time. We’re obsessed with each other.’

Tim is living his best life in the official WhatsApp group (Picture: Channel 4)

The gang even have their very own WhatsApp group, aptly named ‘Circle Chat’ – where all the players are bonding up a storm.

Unfortunately, Richard Madeley has been snubbed from the chat, but Tim is living his best life in it…

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘We’re teaching Tim everything,’ Georgina said, as Ella added: ‘Instead of putting an emoji, he puts like “giggle”.

‘It’s the purest thing in the world.’

Someone get Tim his own TV show ASAP!

description: The Circle fans went wild as Jack Quirk and Beth Dunlavey kissed, becoming the first official romance. Beth gave a cryptic relationship update
